H0.text: what religions are popular in france. Islam

H1.text: what religions are popular in france. Protestantism

H2.text: what religions are popular in france. Judaism

H3.text: what religions are popular in france. Catholicism

A4.text: According to a 2023 Insee survey, Islam is ranked the 2nd largest religion in France.

A5.text: Ipsos focused on Protestants and based on 31,155 interviews found that 57.5% of the total population of France declared to be Catholic and 3.1% declared to be Protestant.
